intent: Set up project architecture and repository structure
instructions: Create monorepo or separate repositories for frontend and backend, set up project documentation (README, architecture docs), define project structure, set up version control, create .gitignore files, establish coding standards and conventions

intent: Set up frontend project with React and Tailwind CSS
instructions: Initialize React project with Vite, install and configure Tailwind CSS, set up project structure (components/, pages/, services/, utils/), configure TypeScript, set up routing (React Router), create base layout components, configure build and dev scripts

intent: Design and implement senior-friendly UI/UX
instructions: Create accessible design system with large fonts, high contrast, clear navigation, implement responsive mobile-first design, create reusable UI components (buttons, cards, forms), ensure WCAG accessibility compliance, test with screen readers, optimize for touch interactions

intent: Set up search service with keyword and filter parsing
instructions: Create SearchService with keyword extraction, implement query parsing using regex and string matching, extract search filters (category, price range, location, property/vehicle attributes), create filter builder utility, add error handling, implement search result formatting
acceptance_criteria: Filter extraction from queries (category, price, location)
Structured filter generation from parsed query
Support for property and vehicle specific filters

intent: Design subscription tier system and daily feed algorithm
instructions: Define subscription tiers (freemium: 5 listings/day, paid: 10, premium: 50, premium_plus: 100), design curation algorithm (newest, verified listings, popular areas, user preferences), create feed caching strategy, implement daily reset logic, design tier upgrade flow
acceptance_criteria: Daily feed limits per tier specified
Feed metadata (limit, remaining, reset time) tracked

intent: Design data models for properties and vehicles
instructions: Design unified listing model with polymorphic support for properties and vehicles, define property-specific fields (bedrooms, bathrooms, area, property type), define vehicle-specific fields (make, model, year, mileage, fuel type), create category taxonomy, design image storage strategy, plan for listing verification
acceptance_criteria: Property fields defined (bedrooms, bathrooms, area, type)
Vehicle fields defined (make, model, year, mileage, fuel)

intent: Set up phone authentication system design
instructions: Design phone number validation and formatting, plan OTP generation and storage, design OTP expiration (5-10 minutes), plan SMS service integration (Twilio/AWS SNS), design JWT token structure, plan session management, design rate limiting for OTP requests
acceptance_criteria: Rate limiting rules for OTP defined

intent: Set up aggregation system for external listings
instructions: Design web scraping architecture for PakWheels and other sources, create data normalization pipeline, design duplicate detection system, plan for listing synchronization, create data quality checks, design error handling for failed aggregations
acceptance_criteria: Web scraping strategy for PakWheels defined

intent: Create NestJS modules structure for classifieds app
instructions: Create NestJS modules: AuthModule (phone authentication), ListingsModule (properties and vehicles), SearchModule (query parsing), FeedModule (daily curated feed), SubscriptionModule (tier management), FavoritesModule (bookmarks), AggregationModule (external listings), configure module imports in AppModule, set up shared modules and common utilities
acceptance_criteria: AuthModule created with phone auth service
ListingsModule with property and vehicle support
All modules properly imported in AppModule

intent: Implement TypeORM entities for classifieds data models
instructions: Create TypeORM entities: UserEntity (phone, tier, timestamps), ListingEntity (polymorphic for property/vehicle with discriminator), PropertyEntity (extends ListingEntity with bedrooms, bathrooms, area, propertyType), VehicleEntity (extends ListingEntity with make, model, year, mileage, fuelType), SubscriptionEntity, FavoriteEntity, SearchHistoryEntity, create entity relationships, add indexes for performance

intent: Implement search service with query parsing
instructions: Create SearchService in SearchModule, implement keyword-based query parsing using regex patterns, extract search filters (category, price range, location, bedrooms, make, model, year), create filter builder utility, add error handling, implement search result caching using Redis, configure search patterns
acceptance_criteria: Filter extraction from queries (category, price, location, attributes)
Structured filter generation from parsed query
Support for property and vehicle specific filters

intent: Implement daily feed curation service with caching
instructions: Create FeedService with curation algorithm, implement tier-based limits (freemium: 5, paid: 10, premium: 50, premium_plus: 100), create feed caching using Redis/CacheManager with 6-hour TTL, implement daily reset scheduler using @nestjs/schedule, create curation logic (newest, verified, popular areas), return feed metadata (limit, remaining, reset time)
acceptance_criteria: Redis caching with 6-hour TTL per user

intent: Implement listing aggregation service for PakWheels
instructions: Create AggregationService, integrate PakWheels scraper from tests-projects, implement data normalization pipeline, create duplicate detection using fuzzy matching, set up scheduled aggregation using @nestjs/schedule, implement error handling and retry logic, store aggregated listings with source metadata, create sync status tracking

intent: Implement phone authentication with OTP using NestJS guards
instructions: Create AuthService with sendOTP and verifyOTP methods, integrate SMS service (Twilio/AWS SNS), create OTP entity with expiration, implement JwtAuthGuard and JwtStrategy, create phone number validation pipe, add rate limiting using @nestjs/throttler, store OTP in Redis with expiration, generate JWT tokens
acceptance_criteria: OTP stored in Redis with 5-10 min expiration

intent: Implement listings controller with advanced filtering
instructions: Create ListingsController with CRUD endpoints, implement QueryBuilderService for dynamic filtering (category, price range, location, property/vehicle specific), add pagination using nestjs-paginate, implement image upload using @nestjs/platform-express multer, create DTOs with class-validator, add authorization guards (owner-only for update/delete), implement search integration

intent: Implement subscription service with payment integration
instructions: Create SubscriptionService with tier management, integrate payment gateway (Stripe/PayPal), implement webhook handler for payment confirmations, create subscription upgrade/downgrade logic, implement subscription expiration checks, add subscription status tracking, create subscription plans configuration, implement grace period for expired subscriptions

intent: Set up file storage service for listing images
instructions: Create FileStorageService, configure AWS S3 integration or local storage, implement image upload with validation (size, type), create image resizing/optimization, implement signed URLs for secure access, add image deletion logic, create file upload DTOs, configure CORS for image access

intent: Add API documentation and validation
instructions: Configure Swagger/OpenAPI with @nestjs/swagger, add API decorators to all controllers, create DTO documentation, add authentication documentation, implement global validation pipe, create custom exception filters, add request/response logging, implement API versioning

intent: Set up backend project structure and infrastructure
instructions: Create a new backend project in ../easeclassifieds-api with Node.js/Express or NestJS, TypeScript, database setup (PostgreSQL/MongoDB), environment configuration, and basic project structure
acceptance_criteria: Basic project structure (src/, controllers/, services/, models/)

intent: Implement phone authentication and OTP service
instructions: Create authentication endpoints: POST /auth/send-otp (sends OTP to phone), POST /auth/verify-otp (verifies OTP and returns JWT token), integrate with SMS service (Twilio/AWS SNS), store OTP in database with expiration, implement JWT token generation and refresh
acceptance_criteria: OTP stored in database with expiration (5-10 minutes)
SMS service integration (Twilio or AWS SNS)

intent: Create database models and schemas
instructions: Design and implement database schemas: User (id, phone, tier, createdAt, updatedAt), Listing (id, category, title, description, price, location, images, sellerId, postedAt, isVerified, property/vehicle specific fields), Subscription (id, userId, tier, startDate, endDate, status), Favorite (userId, listingId), SearchHistory (userId, query, filters, timestamp)
acceptance_criteria: User model with phone, tier, timestamps
Listing model with polymorphic support for property/vehicle
Subscription model with tier and dates

intent: Implement listings CRUD API endpoints
instructions: Create endpoints: GET /listings (with pagination, filters, category), GET /listings/:id, POST /listings (create, requires auth), PUT /listings/:id (update, owner only), DELETE /listings/:id (delete, owner only), GET /listings/my (user's listings), implement image upload handling
acceptance_criteria: GET /listings with filters (category, minPrice, maxPrice, location, bedrooms, make, year)
Image upload support (local storage or S3)

intent: Implement search endpoint with query parsing
instructions: Create POST /search endpoint that accepts user query, parses query using keyword extraction and pattern matching, extracts structured filters (category, price range, location, property/vehicle attributes), returns structured filters and explanation, applies filters to database query, implement search parsing logic
acceptance_criteria: Returns structured filters (category, price range, location, etc.)

intent: Implement daily curated feed endpoint
instructions: Create GET /feed/daily endpoint that returns curated listings based on user's subscription tier (freemium: 5, paid: 10, premium: 50, premium_plus: 100), implement curation algorithm (newest, verified, popular areas), cache feed per user for 6 hours, reset at midnight
acceptance_criteria: Returns listings based on user tier limit
Feed curated by algorithm (newest, verified, popular)
Feed cached per user for 6 hours

intent: Implement subscription management endpoints
instructions: Create endpoints: GET /subscription (current user subscription), POST /subscription/upgrade (upgrade tier, requires payment integration), POST /subscription/cancel (cancel subscription), GET /subscription/plans (list all plans), implement payment webhook handler (Stripe/PayPal)

intent: Implement favorites/bookmarks functionality
instructions: Create endpoints: POST /favorites/:listingId (add to favorites), DELETE /favorites/:listingId (remove from favorites), GET /favorites (get user's favorites), implement favorite count on listings
acceptance_criteria: Favorite count included in listing response

intent: Add authentication middleware and authorization
instructions: Create JWT authentication middleware, implement role-based access control, add rate limiting, implement CORS configuration, add request validation middleware, create error handling middleware
acceptance_criteria: Request validation with proper error messages

intent: Add API documentation and testing
instructions: Create API documentation with Swagger/OpenAPI, write unit tests for services, write integration tests for endpoints, add test data seeding script, configure test database

intent: Create API service layer for backend integration
instructions: Create services/api.ts with axios/fetch client, implement API endpoints: authService (sendOTP, verifyOTP), listingService (getListings, getListing, createListing, updateListing, deleteListing), searchService (search), feedService (getDailyFeed), subscriptionService (getSubscription, upgradeSubscription), favoriteService (addFavorite, removeFavorite, getFavorites), add error handling and token management
acceptance_criteria: API client configured with base URL
JWT token stored and included in requests
TypeScript types for all API responses

intent: Integrate phone authentication with backend
instructions: Update App.tsx auth handlers to call backend API: handleSendCode calls POST /auth/send-otp, handleVerifyCode calls POST /auth/verify-otp and stores JWT token, add loading states and error handling, persist auth state in localStorage, add token refresh logic
acceptance_criteria: Phone number sent to backend for OTP
Auth state persists on page refresh
Error messages displayed for failed auth

intent: Replace mock listings with API integration
instructions: Update MainDashboard component to fetch listings from GET /listings endpoint, implement pagination, replace MOCK_LISTINGS with API calls, add loading states, implement infinite scroll or load more button, handle empty states

intent: Integrate search with backend API
instructions: Update SearchBar to call POST /search endpoint, remove local search parsing logic and use backend endpoint, update search results display, handle API errors gracefully
acceptance_criteria: Search queries sent to backend API
Search filters applied from API response
Fallback to simple search on API failure

intent: Integrate daily feed with backend API
instructions: Update dailyFeed logic in MainDashboard to call GET /feed/daily endpoint, display feed based on user's subscription tier, show feed limit and remaining count, handle feed reset timing, add refresh button

intent: Integrate subscription management with backend
instructions: Update profile page to fetch subscription from GET /subscription, implement upgrade flow calling POST /subscription/upgrade, integrate payment gateway (Stripe/PayPal), show current tier and plan details, handle subscription cancellation

intent: Implement favorites functionality
instructions: Add favorite button to ListingCard, implement add/remove favorite API calls, create favorites page/view, update heart icon in header to show favorites count, persist favorite state, handle errors
acceptance_criteria: Favorite button on each listing card

intent: Add listing detail view and create/edit forms
instructions: Create ListingDetail page/component showing full listing details, create ListingForm component for creating/editing listings, implement image upload, add form validation, integrate with listing API endpoints, add navigation
acceptance_criteria: Listing detail page shows all listing information

intent: Add environment configuration and error handling
instructions: Create .env.example with API_URL, update vite.config to use environment variables, add global error boundary component, implement toast notifications for errors/success, add retry logic for failed requests, add offline detection

intent: Add loading states and optimize performance
instructions: Add loading skeletons for listings, implement React.memo for components, add image lazy loading, implement virtual scrolling for long lists, optimize bundle size, add service worker for caching, implement code splitting
acceptance_criteria: Loading skeletons for all async content

intent: Set up CORS and API communication
instructions: Configure backend CORS to allow frontend origin, test API connectivity, verify JWT token flow, test all endpoints from frontend, add API health check endpoint, configure proxy in vite.config if needed
acceptance_criteria: Frontend can call all backend endpoints

intent: End-to-end testing and bug fixes
instructions: Test complete user flows: registration → login → browse → search → favorite → upgrade → create listing, identify and fix bugs, test error scenarios, verify subscription limits, test on mobile devices

intent: Prepare for production deployment
instructions: Set up production environment variables, configure database for production, set up SSL certificates, configure CDN for static assets, set up monitoring and logging, create deployment scripts, configure CI/CD pipeline
